name: Knee cut (same side / headquarters)
why: Your opponent turns and squares up
description: Knee cut (cross side) from Half Guard
ex1: Dan Manasoiu vs Damon Ramos | 2023 ADCC East Coast Trials (2:13)
ex2: Dan Manasoiu vs Damon Ramos | 2023 ADCC East Coast Trials (2:13)

name: Backstep Reap
why: Your opponent turns down, drops their knee
ex1: Dan Manasoiu vs Damon Ramos | 2023 ADCC East Coast Trials (2:13)
ex2: Dan Manasoiu vs Damon Ramos | 2023 ADCC East Coast Trials (2:13)

name: Double Unders Pass
why: Your opponent brings their leg over the top
ex1: Dan Manasoiu vs Damon Ramos | 2023 ADCC East Coast Trials (2:13)
ex2: Dan Manasoiu vs Damon Ramos | 2023 ADCC East Coast Trials (2:13)
b2: Hammer down and force you back to half
